duties_responsibilities.duty: Submit the Production Part Approval Process (PPAP) of new products and collect PAPP packages for customers.
Create and deploy control plans, FMEAs, and process flows.
Interface with customers for Advanced Product Quality Planning (APQP) reviews, product quality reviews, and complaint reporting.
Validate core team deliverables prior to presentation to the customer and handle quality problems.
Interface with the project team concerning all QA demands from the offer phase till release with grade 1 quality.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Quality Assurance, or a related field (Master's preferred)
